mapper.insert: insert into pointap(pa_no, pp_payno, um_no,pa_point,pa_status) values((select nvl(max(pa_no),0)+1 from pointap), #{um_no}, #{pa_point}, #{pa_status})
mapper.select: select * from pointap order by pa_no asc
mapper.update: update pointAp set pa_point = #{pa_point}, pa_status = #{pa_status} where pp_payno = #{pa_no}
